summary: add 4 new argonian weapons to the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod add four new weapons (concept, models and textures made by Artiedee) to the crafting menu of the forge.
These are the weapons names:
- Obsidian Warhammer
- Bone Talon Dagger
- Silver Jagged Katana
- Steel Great Cleaver

For now they are only craftable and improvable, but i've planned, in a future update, to add them to the leveled lists and to a new argonian merchant that i want make in the Windhelm docks (i'm learning how to do that).
This is my first released mod, hope all is correct...

Big thanks to Ghosu, Frankdema, Prometheus_TS, Cabal120 and Vioxsis for various useful tips about texturing, NifSkope and CK use;
Big thanks also to Bethesda, for obvious motifs, and the Nexus for this great site :D

Merry Christmas, guys.

P.S. The Bone Talon Dagger has a scabbard, but isn't shown in game; i hope that someone can say me why it don't work...
author: Artiedee and Serindas
